attributes.action: change council tax system to be fair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Now, council tax depends on proprty value which does not correlate with income.
Council tax should be scrapped and 1% of vat should go to local councils.
This will make them more interested in good environment for living and for businesses. 
Also overgrown administration and beaurocration should be REDUCED to make everybody living better!!!

It's time to say STOP to overgrown apetite of local councils!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
